entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 12:42 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -36.7°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -40.3°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
